content.en: Algorithmic device optimization: Researchers are exploring the use of algorithms to improve the performance of various medical devices, such as ventricular assist devices and artificial hearts. These algorithms, which act as control systems, can adapt the device's functions to better match the needs of the patient's heart. By regulating factors like flow rate, pressure, and speed, these algorithms aim to optimize the device's performance and potentially enhance patient outcomes.
content.da: Algoritmisk enhedsoptimering: Forskere undersøger brugen af algoritmer til at forbedre ydeevnen af forskellige medicinske enheder, såsom ventrikulære assist enheder og kunstige hjerter. Disse algoritmer, der fungerer som kontrolsystemer, kan tilpasse enhedens funktioner for bedre at matche patientens hjertes behov. Ved at regulere faktorer som gennemstrømningshastighed, tryk og hastighed, sigter disse algoritmer mod at optimere enhedens ydeevne og potentielt forbedre patientens resultater.
